title: Full Stack Developer (Elixir/React)
description: Join KURABU to develop features impacting thousands of sports club members. Take ownership of end-to-end development with an emphasis on Elixir for backend and React for frontend.
responsibilities: Lead and contribute to full-stack development.
Own the complete development lifecycle including architecture, implementation, testing, and deployment.
Design and implement scalable system architecture and robust APIs.
Work closely with team members to deliver the product roadmap.
qualifications: 4+ years of experience as a full stack or backend-leaning engineer.
Strong backend experience with Elixir (or related technologies).
Solid expertise with PostgreSQL and REST APIs.
Experience in React and Typescript is desirable.
incentiveCompensation: 20 days of paid holiday including public holidays.
applicationInstructions: Apply only through JobRack. Respectful communication is expected.
